title: Add MCP self-diagnostics tool for bridge health and loop telemetry
description:
Debugging stalls and choice mismatches currently requires correlating multiple logs. A lightweight MCP diagnostics tool would expose internal bridge telemetry directly for faster triage.

Proposed fields:
- pending_action_age_ms
- current_action_type
- interactions_this_turn
- last_response_retry_count / last_response_age_ms
- recent_choose_action_error_counts by category
- game_log_buffer_usage and trimmed_chars

Goals:
1. Reduce time-to-diagnosis for multiplayer desync and loop cases.
2. Provide structured evidence for automated issue triage scripts.
3. Keep output compact so it is safe for frequent polling.

Suggested source area: Mage.Client.Headless/src/main/java/mage/client/headless/BridgeCallbackHandler.java and Mage.Client.Headless/src/main/java/mage/client/headless/McpServer.java tool list.
